meanings.definition: A countryseat is a large house or mansion in the countryside.
meanings.sent1: The family enjoyed weekends at their beautiful countryseat.
meanings.sent2: The countryseat had a grand garden and a lovely view of the fields.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the countryseat was a perfect place to hide.
meanings.sent4: The countryseat stood like a regal guardian over the rolling hills.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the countryseat felt like stepping into a fairy tale.

meanings.definition: Countryseat can refer to the estate or property surrounding a country house.
meanings.sent1: The countryseat's vast lands were perfect for horseback riding.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the countryseat's grounds revealed hidden ponds and forests.
meanings.sent3: The playful children imagined the countryseat's fields were endless kingdoms.
meanings.sent4: The countryseat's boundaries seemed to stretch to the edge of the world.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the countryseat's estate was truly breathtaking.
